      • draw

        public void draw​(GLMapView view)
        Deprecated.
        Description copied from interface: GLMapRenderable
        Renders the content in the current EGL context for the given view. Initialization of the renderer may occur following instantiation or a prior call to GLMapRenderable.release().

        This method is ALWAYS invoked on the GL thread.

        Specified by:
        draw in interface GLMapRenderable
        Specified by:

      • getRenderList

        protected java.util.Collection<GLResolvableMapRenderable> getRenderList()
        Deprecated.
        Description copied from class: GLAsynchronousMapRenderable
        Returns the Collection containing the renderables associated with the current GLAsynchronousMapRenderable.preparedState.

        This method should only ever be invoked in GLAsynchronousMapRenderable.draw(GLMapView) while holding the lock on this. References to the Collection or any of its elements should not be held outside of that method.

        Specified by:

        Deprecated.
        Description copied from class: GLAsynchronousMapRenderable
        Reset the pending data object. This method is invoked prior to GLAsynchronousMapRenderable.query(ViewState, Object).

        This method will be invoked on the worker thread while synchronized on this.

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

      • createPendingData

        protected com.atakmap.map.layer.raster.mosaic.opengl.MosaicPendingData createPendingData()
        Deprecated.
        Description copied from class: GLAsynchronousMapRenderable
        Creates the pending data object. This object will store the result of the asynchronous query such that the renderable and release lists can subsequently be constructed via the invocation of GLAsynchronousMapRenderable.updateRenderableReleaseLists(Object).

        This method will be invoked on the worker thread in an unsynchronized manner.

        Specified by:
        createPendingData in class GLAsynchronousMapRenderable<com.atakmap.map.layer.raster.mosaic.opengl.MosaicPendingData>
        Returns:
        The object to hold the query result

      • updateRenderableReleaseLists

        protected boolean updateRenderableReleaseLists​(com.atakmap.map.layer.raster.mosaic.opengl.MosaicPendingData pendingData)
        Deprecated.
        Description copied from class: GLAsynchronousMapRenderable
        Constructs the renderable and release lists based on the supplied query result.

        This method will be invoked on the worker thread in an unsynchronized manner. It is STRONGLY that this method not be synchronized in a manner that it may block any of the other methods that are synchronized on this as this may serious degrade rendering performance.

        Specified by:
        updateRenderableReleaseLists in class GLAsynchronousMapRenderable<com.atakmap.map.layer.raster.mosaic.opengl.MosaicPendingData>
        Parameters:
        pendingData - The result of the query
        Returns:
        true if the renderable and release lists were brought into sync with the current GLAsynchronousMapRenderable.targetState, false otherwise. If this method returns true, GLAsynchronousMapRenderable.preparedState will take on the state of GLAsynchronousMapRenderable.targetState and the worker will remain idle until GLAsynchronousMapRenderable.checkState() returns false.

      • getBackgroundThreadName

        protected java.lang.String getBackgroundThreadName()
        Deprecated.
        Description copied from class: GLAsynchronousMapRenderable
        Returns the name for the worker thread.
        Overrides:

        Returns:

      • query

        protected void query​(GLAsynchronousMapRenderable.ViewState state,
                     com.atakmap.map.layer.raster.mosaic.opengl.MosaicPendingData retval)
        Deprecated.
        Description copied from class: GLAsynchronousMapRenderable
        Performs a query based on the specified target state. The results of the query will be used to create valid render and release lists via GLAsynchronousMapRenderable.updateRenderableReleaseLists(Object).

        This method will only be invoked on the worker thread and its invocation will not be externally synchronized. Synchronization of the query itself on this is strongly discouraged as doing so will effectively block GLAsynchronousMapRenderable.draw(GLMapView).

        Specified by:
        query in class GLAsynchronousMapRenderable<com.atakmap.map.layer.raster.mosaic.opengl.MosaicPendingData>
        Parameters:
        state - The state to query against
        retval - Stores the result of the query. The pending data will subsquently be passed to GLAsynchronousMapRenderable.updateRenderableReleaseLists(Object).
